fullText:
Arena Battle Rhythm

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, Dex 13, fighter, Arena Training class feature
Benefit: Whenever you make a melee attack with one of your arena weapons and deal no damage, the target of your attack takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 113.
